item.title: Paper -Hack The Box
item.description: Welcome to another HackTheBox walkthrough, this time we are taking on the Paper box, let’s jump right in! Summary The box is starting with a WordPress version vulnerability. Exploit the vulnerability we can see a secret with a domain which is a chat system. Register the chat system and log in. The chat system has a bot functionality abuse the bot functions we find the credential after that access machine. Exploit a known CVE in this box.

item.title: Backdoor -Hack The Box
item.description: Welcome back to another hack the box walkthrough. This time we are looking at Backdoor. The box is listed as an easy box. Summary Manually enumerating the web. We found a plugin it’s led to a known exploit which is an LFI. Bruteforcing the PID we get the service info. Abusing the service for the initial foothold and also there is another service is running on this box we use that for PrivSec.

item.title: Timing -Hack The Box
item.description: Timing -Hack The Box Welcome to the hack the box walkthrough series. This is my frist HTB walkthrough. Starting with the box Timing. The box is listed as an medium box. Summary Timing is the Hack The Box boot2root machine which is a fun box with a lot of enumeration. The machine runs a simple PHP web server. Enumerating the web directory we discovered an image.php file. Fuzzing that PHP file we found a parameter “?

item.title: Bounty-Hacker -Tryhackme
item.description: Bounty Hacker -Tryhackme Summary Bounty hacker is a TryHackMe machine that is super easy to do, we got the FTP connection and got some credentials after that we access the machine with these credentials and exploit the Sudo permissions to got the root access Machine link https://tryhackme.com/room/cowboyhacker Scanning First, we need to find open ports on the machine Nmap scanning # Nmap 7.92 scan initiated Fri Jan 14 23:24:07 2022 as: nmap -sCV -A -o scan.

item.title: Overpass-1 -Tryhackme
item.description: Overpass -Tryhackme Machine info https://tryhackme.com/room/overpass Summary Overpass is a Tryhackme machine which is related to owasp top 10 vulnerability Bypassing web authentication Accessing machine through ssh Exploiting a weak crontab job Escalating privileged commands Enumeration Regular Nmap port scanning nmap -sCV 10.10.111.163 Starting Nmap 7.92 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-01-23 00:47 EST Nmap scan report for 10.10.111.163 Host is up (0.38s latency). Not shown: 998 closed tcp ports (conn-refused) PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 7.

item.title: Vulnhub-Dc-2
item.description: Machine Info Name: DC-2 Operating System: Linux Url: https://vulnhub.com/entry/dc-2,311/ Summary The dc2 machine is a VM from Vulnhub, This machine starts with a WordPress site and then we used WordPress brute-forcing, With those credentials, we can access the system After bypassing the restricted shell, execute privileged commands we got the final flag Enumeration Identifying the host using Nmap host scan nmap -sn 10.10.10.0/24 Starting Nmap 7.92 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-01-09 08:14 EST Nmap scan report for 10.

item.title: Vulnhub-Dc-3
item.description: vulhubdc3 summary DC3 is the vulunhub machine which is fully takdown using known cve’s first we need to dump the sql databases, with those creditional we login as admin and make a revershell to foothold the machine after that exploit the known vulnerablity we get the root access nmap scan: Starting Nmap 7.92 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-03-10 10:42 IST Nmap scan report for 192.168.1.5 Host is up (0.039s latency). Not shown: 999 closed tcp ports (conn-refused) PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 80/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.

item.title: Sar-1 -VulnHub
item.description: Summary Sar is VM from vulnhub, This machine is hosting a tool sar2HTML which is led to an RCE we gain access to the machine with this RCE after that Exploit a week file permission and get the root access Machine info Name: SAR: 1 Operating System: Linux Author: Love Url: https://www.vulnhub.com/entry/sar-1,425 Enumeration find the target IP using Nmap host scan nmap -sn 10.10.10.0/24 Starting Nmap 7.92 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-01-14 05:53 EST Nmap scan report for 10.

item.title: Matrix -VulnHub
item.description: Summary The matrix VM is a virtual machine from vulnhub it’s a boot2root machine first, we need to find the IP and then scan the IP it discovered some open ports and services after checking those services we got a hint from one web server, with that hint we can access another web server, we got an encoded string from these web server source page decode the strings it’s a bash command with a file name, access the file from the webserver it has an another encode data that includes username and password.
